ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Getting really Annoyed
ygData.msgSnippet: Simple.  Several times I have been actively and publicly opposed to some of their moves for reasons which were poopoo-ed at the time.  A week later they
ygData.messageBody:
Simple. Several times I have been actively and publicly opposed to some of
their moves for reasons which were poopoo-ed at the time. A week later they
admitted they didn't look at all the facts and reversed their stance. They
have 100% info and still can't make up their minds and often change it when
they do. 100 is .05% of 200,000 btw.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 24, 2000 11:41 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Getting really Annoyed


At 11:10 AM 8/24/00 -0600, you wrote:
>I read the everwhine boards, the eqcaster's boards, and the vault boards
>pretty regularly. I don't believe Verant really uses the info at their
>disposal to make those judgments correctly. That's the whole point. They
>do have the info and I think they still make stupid decisions.
>
> Kit

how can you possibly make a judgement on whether the decision is stupid if
you have
0.0001% of the information available???


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
